verses.text: Ix in tanhvejnhej scolval Jehová, haxo ix ab'ani ayic ix in tevi t'ay.
Ix in yik'q'ueta t'a jun olan te ay smay. Ix in scol b'aj sitz'atac. Ix in yak'anq'ue t'a yib'anh jun q'uen q'ueen yic tzin tek'b'ej in b'a.
Ix yak' val jun b'it ak'to t'ayin, b'it yic aloj wach' lolonel t'a co Diosal. Comonoc sat sk'ol jantac eb' tz'ilan jun tik, yic syak'och Jehová eb' yipoc sk'ool.
Te wach' yic eb' tz'ak'anoch Jehová yipoc sk'ool, max yak'och spensar eb' t'a eb' syik'chaanh sb'a, aton eb' tz'och tzak'an t'a spatic juntzanh comon dios.

Mamin Jehová in Diosal, manh jantacoc juntzanh tas satub'tac ix a b'o'o yet' jantac a wach'k'olal ix ak' t'ayonh. Malaj junok mach syal slajb'an sb'a ed'oc. In gana svalel masanil a wach'k'olal chi', palta max in tzak'vanlaj, yujto manhxo b'ischajb'enoc.
Max a nib'ejlaj nok' nok' yet' ixim trigo silab'il. Malaj nok' nok' tza k'ana' yic snhusji silab'il t'ayach, ma silab' yic stupcanel co mul. Palta ix a jac in chiquin yic tzin cha vab' tas tzala'.
Yuj chi' ix vala': Tik tzin ja'i, xin chi. Ha tas tz'ib'ab'ilcan t'a a lolonel, a vab'ixal syala'.
Ach in Diosal, snib'ej in k'ool tzin k'ulej icha a gana. Ayoch a k'ayb'ub'al t'a in pensar.
Mamin Jehová, ix valcanel yab'ixal a tojolal t'a skal eb' a chonhab'. Ojtac val to malaj b'aj ix vactejcan valaneli.

Malaj b'aj max valel a tojolal. Ix valel yab'ixal to tz'elnhejk'och tas tzala', tzak'anpax colnab'il. Malaj b'aj ix in k'ub'ejel t'a yichanh eb' a chonhab' molaneq'ui, to te niwan a wach'k'olal, yelnhej pax tzala'.
Mamin Jehová, ayocab'nhej oq'uelk'olal t'ayin. Ilinnhej yet' a wach'k'olal icha ix aj alani.

Yujto te ay tas sjavi t'a vib'anh, maxtzac b'ischajlaj vuuj. In yamchajelta yuj in chukal. Ichato maxtzac yal-laj vilani. Ek'b'al in chukal chi' t'a yichanh sb'isul xil in jolom. Vanxo somchajel in k'ool.
Mamin, cotanh val q'uelan t'ayin, cotanh, colineli. Cotanh elanhchamel, tzach och ved'oc.
Ha eb' sgana in smilanchamoc, javocab' q'uixvelal yet' somk'olal t'a yib'anh eb'. B'atocab' eb' elelal t'a skal nivac q'uixvelal, yujto sgana eb' yak'an chukal t'ayin.
Ha eb' tzin b'uchani, canocab' eb' t'a manh pensaril yuj somk'olal.
Axo masanil eb' ayoch spensar t'ayach, tzalajocab' eb' t'ayach. Te niwan elk'och ach Jehová, xchiocab' eb' snib'an a colval.
Ha inxo jun, ob'iltac in, ay in och t'a ilk'olal. Mamin, mocab' in b'atcan satk'olal uuj. Ha ach tzach ochtaxon ved'oc yic tzin a colani. Ach Jehová in Diosal, manh iq'uek' tiempo in a colani.
